delete_dialog.title: Delete model

delete_dialog.title: Delete {{type}}
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to remove user {{name}} {{lastName}}?
delete_dialog.warn_information: The user {{firstName}} {{lastName}} is OWNER of applications:
delete_dialog.warn_hint_owner: In this case you will become the OWNER of these applications.
delete_dialog.warn_hint_new_owner: In this case the owner of this applications will be:
delete_dialog.warn_hint_replace_to_owner: In this case, the OWNER of the application will be the global OWNER
delete_dialog.default_confirmation:
{{type}} {{name}} and all related data will be deleted.
Are you sure?

org_users.add_users_info: You are now the only CompreFace user. Once other users sign up, they will appear in this list. You, as an owner, will be able to give them rights to manage system or individual applications.
org_users.edit_user_info: User info has been successfully updated

app_users.add_users_info: All registered CompreFace users except the first one won't see any applications. To give them access you need to add them to individual application. Global Owner and Global Administrators have full access to all applications.

delete_dialog.title: Delete user
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want to remove user {{name}} from {{application}}?
